about.title: About POKY GROUP
about.subtitle: Empowering businesses through innovative technology solutions

hero.title: We Build the Future of Business
hero.description: POKY GROUP is a leading technology company specializing in custom software development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud integration services. We help businesses transform their operations and achieve their digital goals through cutting-edge technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses worldwide by delivering innovative, scalable, and reliable technology solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage in the digital age.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the global leader in technology solutions, recognized for our innovation, excellence, and commitment to transforming businesses through the power of technology.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible, embracing new technologies and methodologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards in everything we do, from code quality to customer service, ensuring exceptional results for our clients.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and work closely with our clients as partners in their success journey.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct business with honesty, transparency, and ethical practices, building trust through every interaction.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.subtitle: We specialize in modern technologies and methodologies
